title: Unspecified Error during update
body: Hey guys, I have a problem whenever I go into the league of legends launcher it launches fine then when the update gets to about 1 to 33 percent a box pops up saying unspecified error. I have tried almost everything and I can't figure it out I have also emailed riot.  pls help

replies.body: Getting an error this early suggests a possible permissions problem with your PC that's blocking your game files from scanning.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access to those files.  Let me know if it helps!
